§lDepth Strider I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of dried kelp (R) and an egg (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
RrR§r

§lFeather Falling I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two feathers (R) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
R R§r

§lFeather Falling II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use three feathers (R) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L

RRR§r

§lRespiration I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a pufferfish as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).

§lThorns I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a stick as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
